--- title: Value keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Class representing a single value and it's confidence." description: "Class representing a single value and it's confidence." nb_path: "src\value.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Value is an element from attribute domain.

Example:

For a given attribute: "outlook {sunny, overcast, rainy}", "sunny[0.7]" is one of possible values.

{% raw %}

class Value[source]

Value(name:str, confidence:float)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Tests

{% raw %} 
value = Value('sunny', 0.7)
assert value.get_name() == 'sunny'
assert value.get_confidence() == 0.7
assert str(value) == 'sunny[0.7]'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
value2 = Value('rainy', 0.3)
assert value != value2
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
value3 = Value('rainy', 0.5)
assert value2 == value3
{% endraw %}
